body:
Thank you. Some feedback

client/kafka_client.go

line 36: you must stop here on error
line 40: you are checking the wrong error

server/ is no longer a main package.

How can we reproduce the problem you see. Thank you.

On Mon, Mar 7, 2016 at 1:30 PM, uaintnothug <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @davecheney <https://github.com/davecheney> Sorry about that. I have
> separated server and client package and also verified that code compiles
> now.
